page.title: 12TRANSPORT
page.content: This was very important in the past. Railway (now closed).Shipbuilding (ended 1882). Shipping(last in 1934). Like many small places it is less important now and the bus depot is to be closed.In rural areas transport is a real problem, distances and petrol prices make it expensive. People have to have cars, therefore public transport declines. Schools help to keep bus companies alive in this area. 12 buses serve this school___ {Crosville,James Llangeithio,Albert {Lewis Llanrhystud.}The school buses also serve the public and they are very crowded at 7:30-9:00am and 4:00 - 5:30pm otherwise they are rarely even half full. They go from Aberaeron to Talgarreg:Llwyndafydd:N.Quay:Mydroilin :Cardigan:Llangrannog:Aberystwyth: Lampeter:Tregaron:Cilcennin:Cribyn. Most of these are quite remote.
